column5: Each spring we get together at Eagle Lake and have a few beers and wet a few lines. My buddies come in from Alberta and Thunder Bay to share some great times with just the boys (ok, we're  old guys, but we're young at heart)  My Buddy Ron has a camp (cottage to you southern ontario guys) and we use 14 and 16 foot boats to brave the waves.  This year we had a little good luck and nailed some really nice walleye, and some lake trout.   here's my buddy Ron running up a creek into our lake trout hole. The fish aren't huge but they are dandy eaters    You can see I'm enjoying being guided instead of having to do all the work.      the previous 2 pictures were Me and Ron showing off our catch.    And of course shore lunch is mandatory when it takes an hour to go up the creek to get to the trout lake. (Beans and weiners and beef stew mixed together, some fresh rye bread and a shot of rye to wash it all down. )    one of the walleye my buddy Dick caught. For a guy from the prairies he sure could catch fish.  Thinking of this weekend is how I make it through the winter.
Great report & fishing trip !!!!.  .nice to be fishin with your buds and having a blast as well,and man oh man gotta love those shore lunches too !!!!..cheers
Great report - and nice to see it called a camp (20 years down here and I'm just starting to use the word cottage).  Nice to get out with the boys for some nice shore lunches.

wow seeing a post like this really brings a smile to my face. especially since i do this kinda of thing with my budds now.  its great that u still get out there with the friends and get a few in the boat. thats awesome!  nothing beats a tasty shore lunch!  tips up
Nice report grt1. And yes, "camp" it is. I can relate to that. Thanks for sharing..
I agree with DanC, "camp" is the correct terminology   :D  :D Great report. Glad you got out with your buds for your annual fishing trip.
Looks like a good time, thanks for the report...
Great report sounds like a wonderful trip at "camp" !!
Camp?  Isn't that a tent thing? LOL.  Great report....and it's awesome that your buds who are scattered all around the country can all come together to share great times like that.
Sounds like a great fishing trip. Thanks for sharing.
Awsome trip!  Looks like it was a blast.  And lake trout shore lunch......mmmmmmnnnnnn
Nicely done --- I know you were looking at ice for a long time waiting for that weekend    Thanks for sharing!
Great report.  Looks like some nice clean cottages and grounds there.  Nice fish too.  Joey
